      public Player choosePlayerForWarlordRandom()
      Randomly choose a player (self-excluded) to destroy a district.
      Returns:
      The chosen player.

    • choosePlayerForWarlordAdvanced

      public Player choosePlayerForWarlordAdvanced()
      According to the G.L.P.A. (game leaderboard prediction algorithm), the Warlord will attack the player in front of him. If the G.L.P.A. predicts the player as the first, Warlord will attack the player behind him.
      Returns:
      The player to attack. (can be null if the spell is not used).

    • chooseCharacterForAssassinAdvanced

    • warlordInterestScore

      public int warlordInterestScore(District district, Player playerToDestroy)
      For a given district, return the interest score the warlord has in destroying this district.
      Parameters:
      district - The district to proceed.
      Returns:
      The interest score the district.

    • chooseDistrictToDestroy

      District chooseDistrictToDestroy(Player playerToDestroy)
      For a given player, will analyze player city to choose a district to destroy.
      Parameters:
      playerToDestroy - The player to proceed.
      Returns:
      The district to destroy (can be null if the spell is not used).
